topics.body:
Personal question time:
Has anyone here ever suffered from a mental breakdown? Like, a real one?

I have and it kick-started a total change of my personality. My behaviour before hand would be described on 4chan as 'autistic' (I was socially awkward as shit). Once I suffered the breakdown, I was a new man. Way more confident and more mature overall.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54088c7463687248b0e10000#post_54088c7463687248b0e10000
I don't remember if I have or not. (Probably not)

!http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q318/Monster_Master316/Ultra%20Galaxy/HyperZetton_zpsa5993715.jpg!
Hyper Zetton is probably the most Powerful Kaiju at the moment. (He solo'd the guy who Solo'd Belial, Ultraman Zero, Along with Two other High tier Ultramen, Dyna and Cosmos)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54088c7463687248b0e10000#post_54088c7463687248b0e10000
I don't know...? I've had some pretty bad freak outs but nothing big enough to trigger any major change. I'm still just as unconfident and scared to socialize as always.
